title: Is there a Santa Claus?
description: Excerpt from Is There a Santa Claus? I would have liked to hear the answers they would have given you. No Santa Claus! Why, there was scarce a man in the lot Who didn't carry a bundle that looked as if it had just tumbled out of his sleigh. I felt of one slyly, and it was a boy's sled - a exible yer.
author: Jacob A. Riis
